_source.text: Administrators typically prefer to define custom accounts because these accounts allow them to better isolate the privileges of an application, which isn't the case when one of the built-in high-privilege local accounts (e.g., Local System, Local Service, Network Service) is used as the service account.

text: **better** isolate the privileges of an application, which isn't the case when one of the built-in **high**
-privilege **local** accounts (e.g., **Local** System, **Local** **Service**, Network **Service**) is used as the **service** account.
